Typealiases.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP8Progressa.name: Progress
Typealiases.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP8Progressa.abstract: (Mail, Error) callback after each Mail is sent. Mail is the mail sent and Error is the error if it failed.

Typealiases.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP10Completi.name: Completion
Typealiases.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP10Completi.abstract: ([Mail], [(Mail, Error)]) callback after all Mails have been attempted. [Mail] is an array of successfully

Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.name: init(withCipherSuite:clientAllowsSelfSignedCertificates:)
Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.abstract: Initialize a configuration with no backing certificates.

Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.name: init(withCACertificateFilePath:usingCertificateFile:withKeyFile:usingSelfSignedCerts:cipherSuite:)
Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.abstract: Initialize a configuration using a CA Certificate file.

Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.name: init(withCACertificateDirectory:usingCertificateFile:withKeyFile:usingSelfSignedCerts:cipherSuite:)
Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.abstract: Initialize a configuration using a CA Certificate directory.

Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.name: init(withChainFilePath:withPassword:usingSelfSignedCerts:clientAllowsSelfSignedCertificates:cipherSuite:)
Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/s:9SwiftS.abstract: Initialize a configuration using a Certificate Chain File.

Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/init(with.name: init(withPEMCertificateString:usingSelfSignedCerts:cipherSuite:)
Structs/TLSConfiguration.html#/init(with.abstract: Initialize a configuration using a PEM formatted certificate in String form.

Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.name: normal
Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.abstract: Upgrades the connection to TLS if STARTLS command is received, else sends mail without security.

Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.name: ignoreTLS
Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.abstract: Send mail over plaintext and ignore STARTTLS commands and TLS options. Could throw an error if server requires TLS.

Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.name: requireTLS
Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.abstract: Only send mail after an initial successful TLS connection. Connection will fail if a TLS connection cannot be established. The default port, 587, will likely need to be adjusted depending on your server.

Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.name: requireSTARTTLS
Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP0.abstract: Expect a STARTTLS command from the server and require the connection is upgraded to TLS. Will throw if the server does not issue a STARTTLS command.

Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html.name: TLSMode
Structs/SMTP/TLSMode.html.abstract: TLSMode enum for what form of connection security to enforce.

Structs/Mail/User.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4Mai.name: name
Structs/Mail/User.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4Mai.abstract: The user’s name that is displayed in an email. Optional.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV4fr.name: from
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV4fr.abstract: The User that the Mail will be sent from.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV2cc.name: cc
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV2cc.abstract: Array of Users to cc. Defaults to none.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV3bc.name: bcc
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV3bc.abstract: Array of Users to bcc. Defaults to none.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV11a.name: attachments
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV11a.abstract: Array of Attachments for the Mail. If the Mail has multiple Attachments that are alternatives to plain

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV11a.name: alternative
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV11a.abstract: Attachment that is an alternative to plain text.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV17a.name: additionalHeaders
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP4MailV17a.abstract: Additional headers for the Mail. Header keys are capitalized and duplicate keys will overwrite each other.

Structs/Mail/User.html.name: User
Structs/Mail/User.html.abstract: Represents a sender or receiver of an email.

Structs/Mail.html.name: Mail
Structs/Mail.html.abstract: Represents an email that can be sent through an SMTP instance.

Structs/SMTP.html.name: SMTP
Structs/SMTP.html.abstract: Used to connect to an SMTP server and send emails.

Structs/TLSConfiguration.html.name: TLSConfiguration
Structs/TLSConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration for connecting with TLS. For more info, see https://github.com/Kitura/BlueSSLService.

Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.name: md5HashChallengeFail
Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.abstract: Hashing server challenge with MD5 algorithm failed.

Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.name: fileNotFound(path:)
Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.abstract: File not found at path while trying to send file Attachment.

Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.name: noAuthMethodsOrRequiresTLS(hostname:)
Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.abstract: The preferred AuthMethods could not be found, or your server is sending back a STARTTLS command and requires a connection upgrade.

Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.name: createEmailRegexFailed
Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.abstract: Failed to create RegularExpression that can check if an email is valid.

Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.name: convertDataUTF8Fail(data:)
Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.abstract: Error converting Data read from socket to a String.

Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.name: requiredSTARTTLS
Enums/SMTPError.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP9SMTPE.abstract: STARTTLS was required but the server did not request it.

Enums/AuthMethod.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP10Aut.name: xoauth2
Enums/AuthMethod.html#/s:9SwiftSMTP10Aut.abstract: XOAUTH2 authentication. Requires a valid access token.

Enums/AuthMethod.html.name: AuthMethod
Enums/AuthMethod.html.abstract: Supported authentication methods for logging into the SMTP server.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
